hero.title: Your <mate>Mate</mate> Helping You Become Australian.
hero.subtitle: Pass the Australian Citizenship Test with confidence. Gamified learning, AI voice tutoring, and personalised prep that feels like playing a game.

features.title: Why PassMate?
features.subtitle: We've transformed the dry, anxiety-inducing test preparation process into an addictive, gamified learning journey.

f1.title: Daily Streaks
f1.desc: Stay motivated with daily streaks and never miss a day of learning.

f2.title: Weekly Leagues
f2.desc: Compete with other learners and climb from Bronze to Diamond.

f3.title: Mock Exam Simulator
f3.desc: Real 45-minute timed exams with official passing scores.

f4.title: 80% Pass Guarantee
f4.desc: We are so confident in our method that we guarantee your success.

testimonials.title: Loved by New Aussies
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from people who became Australian citizens with PassMate.

cta.title: Ready to become an Australian?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of successful users who passed their test on the first try with PassMate.

AITutor.welcomeMistakes: G'day mate! I see you've been working hard but had a few tricky questions lately. Want me to explain some of these?
AITutor.welcomeDefault: G'day mate! I'm Ollie, your citizenship tutor. Whether you want to grill me on Australian history or just have a yarn about life in the sun, I'm here for ya! What's on your mind?
AITutor.errorConnecting: Sorry mate, I'm having a bit of trouble connecting to the network. Try again in a sec!

Masterclass.title: Citizenship Masterclass
Masterclass.heroDesc: Explore the core of Australian democracy and your role in it.
Masterclass.tip: Tip: Pay close attention to the section about the Australian Constitution, as it's a common area for test questions!

m1.title: Module 1: Australia's Foundation
m1.desc: A deep dive into the early history and the path to Federation.

m2.title: Module 2: The Democratic System
m2.desc: Understanding the three levels of government and how voting works.

m3.title: Module 3: Values & Rights
m3.desc: What it means to be an Australian citizen in the modern world.

m4.title: Module 4: Final Test Preparation
m4.desc: Strategies for passing the exam with 100% confidence.

faqs.a1: Yes, our content is constantly updated to reflect the latest version of 'Our Common Bond' and official test patterns.
faqs.q2: How does the AI Tutor work?
faqs.a2: Our AI Tutor is trained on official Australian citizenship resources to answer your specific questions 24/7.
faqs.q3: Can I use PassMate on multiple devices?
faqs.a3: Yes! Your progress syncs across desktop and mobile devices when you sign in.
faqs.a4: We offer a 7-day no-questions-asked refund if you're not satisfied with Premium.

testimonials.title: Hear From Our Mates
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from real users across Australia.

t1.name: Sarah J.
t1.text: PassMate was a game changer! The mock tests were exactly like the real thing. Highly recommend the Test Ready plan.

t2.name: Ahmed K.
t2.text: The AI Tutor (Ollie) helped me understand the Australian values section so much better. I passed on my first try!

t3.name: Li W.
t3.text: Lifetime access is totally worth it. The certificate of readiness gave me the confidence to finally book my test.

q1.a: With a premium plan, you never have to wait for hearts to refill. If you get a question wrong, you can keep practising without any interruptions. Perfect for intense study sessions!

q2.a: No! All our premium plans are one-time payments. You pay once and get access for the specified duration (or lifetime). No hidden fees or recurring charges.

q3.a: Ollie is our advanced AI mascot who can explain complex Australian history, values, and law in simple terms. You can ask Ollie anything while taking a practice test.

q4.q: Can I get a refund if I don't pass?
q4.a: Absolutely. We are so confident in PassMate that if you complete a premium study path and don't pass your official test, we'll refund your payment in full.

trust.secureDesc: Stripe-encrypted payments. We never store your card details.
trust.ratingDesc: Trusted by thousands of new Aussie citizens every year.
trust.refundDesc: Don't pass? Get a full refund on your premium plan. No questions asked.

About.title: About PassMate
About.subtitle: Empowering future Australians through technology and community.
About.missionText: PassMate was born out of a simple observation: the journey to Australian citizenship can be daunting. Our mission is to make this journey accessible, engaging, and successful for every aspiring Australian. We believe that technology should serve people, especially when they are making life-changing commitments to their new home.
About.storyText: Started by a team of immigrants and tech enthusiasts in Melbourne, PassMate combines advanced AI with a deep respect for Australian values. We noticed that existing study tools were often outdated or lacked the personal touch needed to truly understand the 'Fair Go' spirit.
About.ollieText: Ollie isn't just a mascot; he's your study buddy. Designed to be friendly, encouraging, and incredibly knowledgeable, Ollie represents the welcoming spirit of Australia. He's here to yarn about history, explain the rule of law, and cheer you on as you master the Aussie way of life.
About.why1Desc: Ask Ollie anything, anytime. Personalized feedback that helps you learn from mistakes.
About.why2Desc: Our question bank is constantly updated to reflect the latest 2024/2025 test standard.
About.why3Desc: We're so confident in our platform that we offer a full refund if you don't pass.
